content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=3.5, y=2.5)
Consists of steam engine, boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) and boiler at position(x=1.5, y=2.5), offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) and small-electric-pole at position(x=3.5, y=2.5) and small-electric-pole at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of following entities
- Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=1.0) 
- Boiler at position(x=1.5, y=3.0)

### Water supply system at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5), pipe at position(x=-16.5, y=25.5) and pipe at position(x=-15.5, y=25.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too close to each other
- Ensure there is enough space between entities to avoid overlap and connection issues
### Errors when using offshore pump without fluid connections
- Make sure to connect offshore pump to a fluid system to avoid warnings and ensure proper functioning
### Errors when using boiler without fuel
- Ensure boiler has a fuel source, such as coal, to maintain energy production
### Errors when using pipe without fluid connections
- Make sure to connect pipe to a fluid system to avoid warnings and ensure proper fluid flow
